entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Mr.President Trump was very good at responding to coronavirus. He did a great job both at the national health level, at the national economy level and at the international diplomatic level. Despite the largest epidemic since World War II, it responded well with less damage!👍
